Content.Text:
<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hrn? Well, not every day I see a new face.
<PAGE>
Ah, so you're the young'un who's moved in up at
that farm. Good to finally meet'cha.
<PAGE>
I'm <BLUE>Otmar</BLUE>. I run this little General Store here.
<PAGE>
Now, I reckon to you it might not seem all that
fancy. I don't have much, but I do have a lot
you'll find handy on a farm.
<PAGE>
Come on in and chat me up at the counter
during business hours. I'll show you what I've
got fer sale.

<FACE_OTMAR><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. Thanks for stopping by
the General Store.
<PAGE>
Now, I reckon to you it might not seem all that
fancy. I don't have much, but I do have a lot
you'll find handy on a farm.
<PAGE>
Come on in and chat me up at the counter
during business hours. I'll show you what I've
got fer sale.
